net.sf.beezle.mork.grammar

Class Grammar

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.beezle.mork.grammar.GrammarBase
      • net.sf.beezle.mork.grammar.Grammar

  • public class Grammar
extends GrammarBase
    Context free grammar. Symbols are coded as ints. Preferred variable name for symbols is sym. Productions are coded as ints. Preferred variable name for productions is prod.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class net.sf.beezle.mork.grammar.GrammarBase
